author: Chris Sanders
comment: Really effective app and very simple. The app provides a single button to stop all apps (I don't seem to have an 'advanced settings' button). It's also not clear what the app is doing to my watche but it has definitely boosted battery life and has sped up the whole wear 2.0 experience on my ticwatch s. In that respect, how can I complain? I definitely recommend the app.

author: Gordon N
comment: Battery life was all over the place. Had to charge at least once ever 24hours sometimes it was dead within a few hours. Was not happy with it at all. After this was installed it's a whole different story. 48 hours plus after every charge.  :-D
title: Sony wear 3

author: Grant Mumaugh
comment: A task manager is great for Android Wear. It works very well and it has helped me close apps that weren't responding. It doesn't have all the features that task manager on Windows does though, such as CPU and RAM usage, but it works well.

author: Lee Nails
comment: All normal apps came back to life after killed.   REPLY: Yes they're normal non blue apps.  In fact I pressed the killed all and the non blue were gone for a minute or so.  This is on LG Urbane 2nd LTE.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Apps with a blue text are system services. Android Wear does not allow to kill them! Please review again. Thank you.

title: Don't work

author: ian n
comment: Works as expected. Only issue I have is I have TouchOSC sideloaded on a Moto 360 and when I kill it and try to reopen it it still takes me to the same screen, and without a back button I get stuck on that screen. I can still quit it and use the watch as normal but I have to restart the watch to get back to TouchOSC's main menu, where I was hoping this app would properly exit it so I could relaunch and be back at the main menu. Other than that it works great.

author: Nathan Cunningham
comment: Phone: S. Galaxy S3 Watch: Asus Zenwatch 2. Great app to have, the only way i could figure out how to close unnecessary apps running in the background. I installed this and it's worked as advertised everytime I've needed to use it. So far no problems and it's simple to use.
title: Works as Advertised

author: PrivacyPlease NoOnlineSnoops
comment: I love being able to kill apps running in the background on my watch-- particularly those that failed to terminate properly after use! It helps you see what apps are causing unnecessary battery drain and selectively kill them or even kill all running apps with one touch. This is my favorite and most used android wear utility app in the Play store. Mad props and special thanks to the developer for creating this task manager for android wear watches!
title: A Must-Have App for Smartwatches!

author: Bryce G
comment: This app is great. Whenever my watch starts lagging I simply open up this app and click "Close All" and I'm back to running at full speed.

author: Behzad Live
comment: After using this app , stop show massage in my watch and stopping important app . If this app is ok , the google inc will be supported.
title: Sms close

author: DIY Mods
comment: If you will make it kill apps automatically, it's will be the best task manager
title: Would be awesome

author: Kai Loon Koh
comment: Worked as advertised. Please fix the app drawer image. It changed my Pixel's setting app image to a low res pixelated image. Thanks.

author: Danny Kirk
comment: Before this app I would have to uppair and reset my Huawei watch when the battery percentage started dropping. Now with this app I found a watch face that was running but shouldn't of been running on my watch and I was able to kill it and my battery percentage drop went back to normal. This is a must have app for your watch.
There is no meaning of this app. All process start again in the same second
title: Useless

author: Sami DOUBLIER
comment: Bug or it's normal? But the app isn't detecting any other process since I've made the upgrade to android wear V2...

author: Mario S
comment: No longer works since the release of AW 2.0. Developer should really push an update.. especially considering it's been nearly 2 years.

author: Jesse Reczko Jr
comment: Does not work for LG urbane 2 watch - apps ignore the task end process

author: Adrian Brown
comment: Don't really know the reason for this apps existence. What is more worrying is I don't know how to get it off my watch.

author: Simon Johnstone
comment: Awful.  Does nothing on Android Wear 2.0 with Huawei watch 2

author: Ben Liu
comment: Does not close apps properly on Android Wear 2.0. Please fix.

author: Antony Xavier
comment: Nice app,i was thinking about an app which gives me list of foreground/background processes.this app does the job, it helps us to identify unwanted app and close it.
title: Superb

author: Brad
comment: NEWS FLASH:  MISFIT VAPOR IS ANDROID WEAR 2.0

comment: And need automatically kill white and blue of choice.
title: Can you make root thru kill blue text  ?

author: pavansivaram Girijala
comment: Sony Smartwatch3 battery backup boosted like anything after using this app. Great App

comment: I don't have option to open it on phone. How will it work??
title: How will it work?

author: Dave Lake
comment: Completel useless!
title: This task manager sucks

author: Mike Callery
comment: I likely, with time, will appreciate the app more. What I think might be nice is an option to run automatically, at pre-determined times.

author: robert klepinger
comment: Moto 360 gen2 runs much faster after using this. Great app
title: Night and day difference on my Moto360 2nd

comment: Not working on samsung s4
title: Useless

author: Tony Minides
comment: Since I still get the battery with down by about 18 so I have to deinstall it now
title: Battery killer

author: RexlessTazz
comment: Used to work amazingly, but now after the Android Wear 2 update, it no longer works. Please fix.

author: Arthur Shogenoff
comment: Seems to show just all installed app, not only running

author: Gee Bee
comment: Closes all apps it can.obviously some cannot and others restart but that is to be expected. Thanks

author: dylan benninghove
comment: This app does what it says it does! I was concerned by the lack of a task manager on my ZenWatch 2 and this does just what I need it to!
title: Just what I needed!

comment: No longer showing on moto 360 using Pixel XL Android O dp3

author: B E Smith
comment: Awesome app
title: Task manager for android wear

author: Lee White
comment: I wish I could uninstall apps on my watch from this app.

comment: Seems like not working for Fossil Marshal 2

author: Dennis Pishev
comment: Great! And feels great.

comment: I've installed but... nothing. I wonder it's a malware or something.
